content: where roos and peacocks reign supreme this elegant crescent shaped shawlette features a stockinette center and an easy to memorize peacock lace border to add a touch of fun best of all you can knit this with that special skein of sock yarn that is just too luscious for walking on both written and charted instructions provided instructions included for a larger version sample shawl used 151 gms 370 yds of socks that rock medium-wt and measures 18 x 47 washed and blocked if you are using a different fingering weight yarn you should be able to knit the shawlette using 100 gms of yarn
